name: Bay Area Legal Aid (BayLegal)
description: With clinics spread across seven counties in the Bay area, including San Francisco, BayLegal's mission is to provide meaningful access to the civil justice system through quality legal assistance for low-income, homeless residents, include the working poor, seniors, veterans, and people with disabilities. BayLegal's office in San Francisco currently has limited in-person hours, but their staff continues to provide services remotely. For the latest update on BayLegal's SF office, visit https://ba
